title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: Warp; Paired S-spun linen.  Wefts; Paired S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Technique: Weft-faced plain weave (13/cm x 40/cm) and slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrappings.
description: Monochrome, dark pattern on light ground. Probably was a shoulder decoration.  Square medallion with a roundel enclosing a running quadruped animal and plant motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment.Medium: Warp; Paired S-spun linen.  Wefts; Paired S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Technique: Weft-faced plain weave (13/cm x 40/cm) and slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrappings.. 1955-157-12.
